sentences.en: A message was flashing on his pager.
sentences.cn: 他的寻呼机上闪现着一个信息。

sentences.en: Scores of messages on his pager have not been answered.
sentences.cn: 他寻呼机上的许多信息都还没有回复。

sentences.en: You have to carry a pager so that they can call you in at any time.
sentences.cn: 你得带个传呼机，以便他们随时可以联系到你。
